jackson.neighborhoods: Downtown, Fondren, Belhaven, South Jackson, West Jackson, North Jackson
jackson.meetingHighlights: State capital recovery with diverse meetings from Fondren to suburbs; strong African American community presence.
jackson.transitInfo: JATRAN bus service; Jackson-Medgar Wiley Evers International Airport (JAN); I-20 and I-55 hub.

gulfport.neighborhoods: Downtown Gulfport, Orange Grove, West Gulfport, North Gulfport
gulfport.meetingHighlights: Gulf Coast recovery serving Gulfport-Biloxi area; beach community meetings; strong resilience post-Hurricane Katrina.
gulfport.transitInfo: Coast Transit Authority buses; Gulfport-Biloxi International Airport (GPT); US Highway 90.

hattiesburg.neighborhoods: Downtown Hattiesburg, USM campus area, Oak Grove, Petal
hattiesburg.meetingHighlights: College-town recovery near University of Southern Mississippi; Hub City meetings; young people and family groups.
hattiesburg.transitInfo: Hub City Transit buses; Hattiesburg-Laurel Regional Airport (PIB); I-59 corridor.
